values_total.description: The total values of the Deals grouped by Deal currency

value.description: The total value of Deals in the Deal currency group

count.description: The number of Deals in the Deal currency group

value_converted.description: The total value of Deals converted into the company default currency

value_formatted.description: The total value of Deals formatted with Deal currency. E.g. €50

value_converted_formatted.description: The value_converted formatted with Deal currency. E.g. US$50.10

weighted_values_total.description: The total weighted values of the Deals grouped by Deal currency. The weighted value is calculated as probability times Deal value.

value.description: The total weighted value of the Deals in the Deal currency group

count.description: The number of Deals in the Deal currency group

value_formatted.description: The total weighted value of the Deals formatted with Deal currency. E.g. €50

total_currency_converted_value.description: The total value of Deals converted into the company default currency

total_weighted_currency_converted_value.description: The total weighted value of Deals converted into the company default currency

total_currency_converted_value_formatted.description: The total converted value of Deals formatted with the company default currency. E.g. US$5,100.96

total_weighted_currency_converted_value_.description: The total weighted value of Deals formatted with the company default currency. E.g. US$5,100.96
